Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.quizapp.quiz.backend.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents a video game entity within the application.

Maps to the database structure and contains detailed information such as title, description, release date, genres, and platforms.

Author:
machm

    • Game

      public Game()
      Default no-args constructor.

    • Game

      public Game(int id, String externalId, String title, String description, LocalDate releaseDate, String backgroundImage, Double rating, List<String> genres, List<String> platforms, Timestamp createdAt)
      Full constructor for initializing all fields of a Game.
      Parameters:
      id - Internal ID.
      externalId - External API ID.
      title - Game title.
      description - Game description.
      releaseDate - Release date.
      backgroundImage - URL to the background image.
      rating - Game rating.
      genres - List of genres.
      platforms - List of platforms.
      createdAt - Creation timestamp.

    • Game

      Lightweight constructor for simple use cases (e.g., lists or simple displays). Keeps backward compatibility.
      Parameters:
      id - Internal ID.
      title - Game title.
      imageUrl - URL to the background image.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this Game object with the specified object for equality.

      Two Game objects are considered equal if and only if they have the same id and the same title.

      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - The object to compare with this Game.
      Returns:
      true if the specified object is equal to this Game; false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code value for this Game object.

      The hash code is calculated based on the id and title fields, consistent with the fields used in the equals method, satisfying the general contract for Object.hashCode.

      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
      Returns:
      A hash code value for this object.
